epd_metadata.declared_product: cement products produced by Holcim El Salvador
epd_metadata.third_party_verifier: Geoffrey Guest, Certified 3rd Party Verifier under the CSA group

product_description.company_description: Holcim El Salvador, part of the Holcim Group, produces and markets cement and ready-mix concrete, with a focus on sustainability and recycling.
product_description.product_classification: UN CPC Group 3744-Cement or CSI MasterFormat Division 03 30 00 Cast-in-Place Concrete

cement_design_summary.description: Ideal for the production of prefabricated products and molded structures.
Cement with no additives, composed only of clinker mixed with a small percentage of gypsum in the final grind.

lca_information.study_goal: To comply with the procedures for creating a Type III environmental product declaration (EPD) and publish the EPD for public review.
lca_information.cut_off_criteria: Minimum of 95% of the total inflows (mass and energy) included. 1% cut-off for all renewable and non-renewable primary energy consumption.

carbon_emission_context.electricity: El Salvador uses hydropower for 93% of their electricity.
carbon_emission_context.direct_a3_emissions: Only decarbonization of the clinker at the kiln is calculated. Other emissions modeled using ecoinvent unit processes.

recycled_materials_handling.recycled_reused_materials: Detailed in the A1 input table.
recycled_materials_handling.module_a1_material_losses: Default loss factors assumed: 2% waste factor used throughout.

data_sources_and_quality.precision: Manufacturers collected and provided primary data on their annual production.
data_sources_and_quality.completeness: All relevant specific processes considered and modeled.
data_sources_and_quality.consistency: Same modeling structure across respective product systems.
data_sources_and_quality.reproducibility: Internal reproducibility possible with stored data and models.

additional_info.limitations: This EPD does not support or provide definitive comparisons of the environmental performance of specific products.
